review: Dr. Lad is an exceptional Orthopedic, thorough in his examination, complete in his explaintion of the problem and it’s remedies and doesn’t prescribe any unnecessary tests and medication. You leave feeling good and happy that you will be back to complete, normal movements soon.
reply_text: Thank you Nazia for the very kind words!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Extremely nice doctor who took the time to understand the history and give a very clear assessment of the situation and treatment options.  Answered all our questions and has an excellent bedside manner.
Very thorough and convincing. Frank and moderate. Physical examination more important as compared to x-ray results. Time taken for examination and explanation.

Dr. Lad was easy to speak with, gave plenty of time to me and showed genuine care and concern. He did not over-investigate or unnecessarily medicate me.
I would highly recommend this doctor to anyone.
Very good. He is very practical and clinically oriented. He gives enough I time to look at the problem and answer all questions
